explains: v. 激励，鼓舞；赋予灵感，激发（想法）；使产生（感觉或情感）；引起，导致；吸气，吸入

sentences.en: He has neither the policies nor the personal charisma to inspire people.
sentences.cn: 他既没有谋略也没有个人魅力去鼓舞人。

sentences.en: We must promote originality, inspire creativity and encourage innovation.
sentences.cn: 我们必须提倡独创性，激发创造力，鼓励创新。

sentences.en: Subjects were picked to inspire or entertain.
sentences.cn: 主题的选择是为了启发或娱乐。
